data.lyric:
[ti:Are You Lonely]
[ar:Steve Aoki/Alan Walker]
[al:Are You Lonely]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Are You Lonely - Steve Aoki (斯蒂夫·青木)/Alan Walker (艾兰·沃克)/ISÁK
[00:03.77]Lyrics by：Jesper Borgen/Øyvind Sauvik/Ella Marie Hætta Isaksen/Karra Madden/Reid Stefanick
[00:07.54]Composed by：Steve Aoki/Alan Walker/Anders Froen/Fredrik Borch Olsen/Jesper Borgen/James Njie/Øyvind Sauvik/Ella Marie Hætta Isaksen/Karra Madden/Reid Stefanick
[00:11.31]I know that you're calling me
[00:13.62]To light up a leather shadow
[00:16.29]That follows you underneath
[00:18.69]I know that you're calling me
[00:20.71]I don't want to play it safe
[00:23.76]Cause I don't contend like that
[00:26.13]Just keep falling into me
[00:28.91]I know I got your back
[00:36.19]Are you lonely
[00:37.93]Are you lonely
[00:39.23]Are you lonely
[00:41.97]I'll stand by you
[00:44.40]I'll stand by you
[00:47.00]Are you lonely
[00:48.70]Are you lonely
[00:49.91]Are you lonely
[00:52.60]I'll stand by you
[00:55.01]I'll stand by you
[01:29.76]Whoever said it was easy
[01:32.31]They never know what we do
[01:34.97]Oh when these walls fall down
[01:38.00]I'll stand by you
[01:40.64]What you believe in
[01:42.95]I'll give it to you
[01:45.63]Cause when these walls fall down
[01:48.73]I'll stand by you
[01:50.98]Are you lonely
[01:52.75]Are you lonely
[01:53.94]Are you lonely
[01:56.52]I'll stand by you
[01:59.05]I'll stand by you
[02:01.60]Are you lonely
[02:03.30]Are you lonely
[02:04.55]Are you lonely
[02:07.19]I'll stand by you
[02:09.69]I'll stand by you
data.trans:
[ti:你是否孤独寂寞]
[ar:Steve Aoki/Alan Walker]
[al:你是否孤独寂寞]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.77]//
[00:07.54]//
[00:11.31]我知道你呼唤着我
[00:13.62]照亮你心底的黑暗角落
[00:16.29]追随你的真心
[00:18.69]我知道你呼唤着我
[00:20.71]我不想这般小心谨慎
[00:23.76]因为我不喜欢那样争斗不休
[00:26.13]就来我的怀抱吧
[00:28.91]我知道我会无条件的支持你
[00:36.19]你是否孤独寂寞
[00:37.93]你是否孤独寂寞
[00:39.23]你是否孤独寂寞
[00:41.97]我会在你身旁
[00:44.40]我会在你左右
[00:47.00]你是否孤独寂寞
[00:48.70]你是否孤独寂寞
[00:49.91]你是否孤独寂寞
[00:52.60]我会在你身旁
[00:55.01]我会在你左右
[01:29.76]从未说过这轻而易举
[01:32.31]也从未明白我们该怎么做
[01:34.97]当防备高墙坍塌陷落之时
[01:38.00]我会在你身旁
[01:40.64]你所坚信不疑的
[01:42.95]我会全部都交给你
[01:45.63]当防备高墙坍塌陷落之时
[01:48.73]我会在你身旁
[01:50.98]你是否孤独寂寞
[01:52.75]你是否孤独寂寞
[01:53.94]你是否孤独寂寞
[01:56.52]我会在你身旁
[01:59.05]我会在你左右
[02:01.60]你是否孤独寂寞
[02:03.30]你是否孤独寂寞
[02:04.55]你是否孤独寂寞
[02:07.19]我会在你身旁
[02:09.69]我会在你左右
